game.name: Rainbow Muffins Saras Cooking Class
game.description:
Rainbow Muffins Saras Cooking Class is an awesome fun cooking game for girls where you will get a chance to learn how to prepare some super yummy cupcakes under the supervision of world popular chef â€“ Sara. Check this free online game and learn how to turn them out. Cupcakes is basically seen as a treat for teens, kids and grown-ups. Try them out whether you are a kid, teen or a grown-up and get a chance to show your fabulous creativity, imagination and cooking skills. 

You will desperately prepare rainbow muffins at your home after playing this cool html5 game in your device. You as a player will also get an opportunity to decorate this dish and challenge your creativity in this worldwide popular cooking game for girls and boys. This easy-to-play and fun game offers an unmatched learning environment. The primary goal in this pretty challenging girls game is to complete the task within the time limit in order to score a high score.

No need to worry about how to prepare your cupcakes since the game is equipped with the complete recipe instructions. Give your best and also bake this extremely scrumptious sweet at your home and serve them in front of your friends and family. Play this brand new cooking game in your favourite browser and have the best time of your life! Prepare your item using the tools in the kitchen area in first level. In second level, you can focus on its decoration part. Hurry up kids! Do not waste your time anymore! Play the best kitchen game to learn the best kitchen recipe!
